Introduction This second CASACASA0005 GI Systems and Science seminar. It aims advanced your to data visualization skill in R using the ggplot2 package. By the end of the seminar you will be able to: - Advanced your knowledge about ggplot2 in R - Know ten advanced customization in ggplot - Create a high resolution graph for your research - Trouble-soluting by yourself
